page.title: 04MADELEY STAFFS : FARM MARKET
page.content: Madeley lies between Crewe & Newcastle markets where local farmers can buy & sell livestock,produce & equipment,meet neighbours and discuss prices and conditions-mainly the weather-every week. There are some local shows in the summer in Betley & Nantwich, & the County Show every May in Stafford.In Madeley a few agricultural machines are exhibited at the summer Fete.The National Farmers' Union,which is strong in the area,will usually organise an excursion to the large fatstock show in London,at Christmas time.This lasts about a week.A special train travels from Crewe.It is quite an event in the farming year & is enjoyed by everyone.
